text: Re is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola in the Italian region of Piedmont. Re is about from Domodossola and from the border with Switzerland. As of 2004, 805 people lived there. It has an area of .All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Re is next to these municipalities: Craveggia, Cursolo-Orasso, Malesco, Villette. == References == == Other websites == * * Re centro di turismo religioso Re Religious Tourism Website Category:Settlements in Verbano-Cusio-Ossola
title: Re, Piedmont
